label: lem-sasaki-single-walker-positional-error
name: Single-walker positional error bound in the Sasaki metric

source.section: 2.3.3 Continuity of the Expected Raw Distance Vector

relations_established.label: rel-expected-distance-error-positional-displacement-approximation
relations_established.expression: \left| \mathbb{E}_{c \sim \mathbb{C}_i(\mathcal{S}_1)} \left[ d_{\mathcal Y}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\varphi(w_{1,i}), \varphi(w_{1,c})) \right] - \mathbb{E}_{c \sim \mathbb{C}_i(\mathcal{S}_1)} \left[ d_{\mathcal Y}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\varphi(w_{2,i}), \varphi(w_{2,c})) \right] \right| \le d_{\mathcal Y}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\varphi(w_{1,i}), \varphi(w_{2,i})) + \mathbb{E}_{c \sim \mathbb{C}_i(\mathcal{S}_1)} \left[ d_{\mathcal Y}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\varphi(w_{1,c}), \varphi(w_{2,c})) \right]

properties.label: error-bound-type
properties.description: The relationship provides an upper bound on the absolute error in expected distances

properties.label: error-components
properties.description: The bound decomposes into walker's own displacement and average displacement of potential companions

proof_structure.strategy: Apply metric inequalities and probability theory to decompose and bound the absolute error

steps.technique: Jensen's inequality for convex function f(x) = |x|
Reverse triangle inequality in metric space: |d(a,b) - d(c,d)| ≤ d(a,c) + d(b,d)
steps.expression: \left| d_{\mathcal Y}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\varphi(w_{1,i}), \varphi(w_{1,c})) - d_{\mathcal Y}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\varphi(w_{2,i}), \varphi(w_{2,c})) \right| \le d_{\mathcal Y}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\varphi(w_{1,i}), \varphi(w_{2,i})) + d_{\mathcal Y}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\varphi(w_{1,c}), \varphi(w_{2,c}))

steps.technique: Substitute inequality into expectation and apply linearity
steps.expression: \Delta_{\mathrm{pos},i} \le \mathbb{E}_{c \sim \mathbb{C}_i(\mathcal{S}_1)} \left[ d_{\mathcal Y}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\varphi(w_{1,i}), \varphi(w_{2,i})) + d_{\mathcal Y}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\varphi(w_{1,c}), \varphi(w_{2,c})) \right] = d_{\mathcal Y}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\varphi(w_{1,i}), \varphi(w_{2,i})) + \mathbb{E}_{c \sim \mathbb{C}_i(\mathcal{S}_1)} \left[ d_{\mathcal Y}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\varphi(w_{1,c}), \varphi(w_{2,c})) \right]

assumptions: Walker i is alive in swarm S_1 (s_{1,i} = 1)
Companion selection measure C_i(S_1) is well-defined
Sasaki metric d_Y^{Sasaki} is a valid metric on algorithmic space Y
Projection map φ maps walkers to algorithmic space

mathematical_context.role: Establishes single-walker error bound for continuity analysis of distance measurement operator in Sasaki geometry
